name: Dinosaur Bone Digging
description:
Excavate and collect ancient dinosaur bones and different hidden objects, clean the bones and make even your own dinosaur!!!

This is your chance to become paleontologists and explorers of the prehistoric era. We combined archaeologist games with educational dinosaurs puzzles to create an amazing prehistoric world where everyone can enjoy themselves!

Game Features:
- More than 3 ways to collect bones and solve puzzles with fossil dinosaurs
- Dig dinosaur bones!
- Fish removes fossils from the sea!
- Turn on flashlight to find bones in differents dark caves
- Form your own dinosaur museum
